text: Mercara is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jude Attipetty, starring Vishak Koshi and Abhirami in the lead role. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_mercara.htm ==Cast== * Vishak Koshi * Jasal * Abhirami ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Mercara (film)
